reviews.review_msg: This class was a book club.

David not only expresses genuine interest in his subject matter, but also in the learning experience and environment of his students. He is always available to help if you need it. Intersting, educational and fun. Excellent guest speakers and field trips.

David has a passion for his field, great sense of humour and never makes your ideas seem invalid.Lots of videos and a field trip or two. Is really there for his students. His partner Sophie McCall (Can Lit) is of equal calliber.

prof is fair, encourages debate. 'Facilitator' type, but a little too passive, and seminars tend to lack focus. Student discussion is one thing, but for upper div courses, the prof needs to say more. It's a class, not a book club.
